description: The Him Kukkut Palan Yojna aims to provide financial assistance to Scheduled Caste individuals for establishing poultry units, promoting self-employment and income generation through poultry farming.
key_features: Subsidy of Rs. 12,000 for establishing a poultry unit with 500 broiler birds
Support for Scheduled Caste individuals to promote poultry farming

category_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Caste
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Himachal Pradesh

steps: Contact the local Animal Husbandry Department
application_process.note: Details on application process may vary by district; contact local authorities for specifics

special_notes: Scheme is specifically for Scheduled Caste individuals
